laboratory_examinations.findings: Leukocytosis, Hematocrit (Hct) of 34. Left shift noted.
Unremarkable except for chronic kidney disease and hyperkalemia.

Enlarged porta hepatis lymph node, right adrenal adenoma measuring 2.4 cm, small hiatal hernia, diverticula in distal descending colon extending through mid sigmoid colon with pericolonic inflammation. No evidence of macro perforation or drainable fluid collection.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable pulmonary nodules in left lower lobe since previous examination.
